DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate impact oral rosuvastatin diabetic polyneuropathy , role lipid peroxidation nerve growth factor .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Rosuvastatin Diabetic Polyneuropathy : A Phase IIa Randomized Double-blind Placebo-controlled Study
DOC.criteria: Patients type 2 diabetes mellitus Glycated hemoglobin < 12.0 % Signing informed consent Presence abnormality nerve conduction study Symptoms sign diabetic polyneuropathy Pregnancy lactation Foot ulcer Treatment statins Antioxidant drug and/or supplement one month previous enrolment Inability mobilize Renal and/or hepatic failure
